author: Staff Reporter
text:
As part of DMK Treasurer M.K. Stalin’s Namakku Name campaign, the party’s medical wing will organise a function in the city on January 10, where doctors, patients, medical policy experts and others will discuss various issues concerning medicine and the State, the wing’s president Poongothai Aladi Aruna said here on Friday.

Addressing journalists, she said that patients would have a chance to air their grievances and doctors will be able to address them.

Debate on what was required to make quality medical care and medicine affordable to all will form part of the programme. The outcome of the programme will form part of DMK’s policy if it should form the government.

Mr. Stalin will participate in the meeting here.
title: DMK’s medical wing conference today
